name: Good Dog!
description:
Objective: Pet all your dogs before leaving for work!

This is a game jam project that was made with some rank amateurs! Only have one level :)

Controls:

WASD - movement

Mouse 1 - Pet

Assets:

Dogs - https://opengameart.org/content/street-animal-pixel-art

Interior Furniture - https://kenney.nl/

Fonts - https://github.com/OOQQ/ZX-Spectrum-font

Audio - https://kenney.nl/ 

Songs - https://opengameart.org/content/shake-and-bake

https://opengameart.org/content/mushroom-dance
